name: Survive The Night (Mighty_George)
description:
Do you like zombies!? Yes? No? Well it doesn't really matter, cause you get to blow them up anyway!

'Your a lone survivor who's sole purpose is to KILL THOSE ZOMBIES! GRAB YOUR WEA- woops.. caps lock was still on.. lets try that again. Grab your weapon of choice and blow those zombie brains out'a this world! Save up your points to buy new weapons and get that score as high as humanly possible!'

How about some info on how the game works?

Basically, you "wipe out" any enemies on the map, and if you're successful, you move on to the next round, but first you get to decide whether to spend those hard-earned points on some new weapons. Once you've made your choice, it's on to the next round. Every kill earns you points and a higher score. HOW MANY NIGHTS CAN YOU SURVIVE?!

There is controller support for the game if your feeling up to the challenge, However, please be aware that it has only been tested with an xbox one controller.

Controls:

The controls are listed in the game as well.

Keyboard/Mouse

WASD | LShift | SPACE | F | ESC | Number keys 1 and 2 | Left/Right mouse | Scroll

Controller

Left/Right stick | Left stick press | Right menu button | Left/Right Trigger | Left/Right buttons | A | X | Y
